mapper.update: update admin set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, name, gender, email, telephone from admin
